metadata.title: CVE-2018-1134 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Moodle 3.x. Students who submitted assignmentsand exported them to portfolios can download any stored Moodle file bychanging the download URL.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
